Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Okay lets take a look at this event log The main goal is to identify any activities that occur more than once within the same case and then rename them based on their context

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: First Ill scan through each case C001 C002 C003 to see if there are duplicate activity names

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: In C001 Verify Documents appears twice The first time its when the BackOfficeAgent checks initial documents and then again after the customer submits additional ones

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: For C002 Theres also two instances of Call Customer The first one is about clarifying an account discrepancy while the second is a followup after adjustments were made

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: C003 has another pair of Verify Documents once for initial physical verification and then again postadjustment

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: So I need to rename these activities For Verify Documents maybe adding something like Initial or Reverify For Call Customer perhaps differentiating between an outbound call and a followup call

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Let me check the Additional Context column for more clues The first Verify in C001 says checks identity documents while the second mentions rechecks documents now that ID scan is provided So maybe renaming them as Verify Documents Initial vs Reverify Documents

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Similarly for C002s calls the first has a reason about an account discrepancy and the followup confirms adjustments Maybe name them accordingly

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Ill proceed to rename each instance and update the event log with these new names
